page.title: 05OLD KNACKER'S YARD _ BRISCO
page.content: The old knacker's yard,which is still in use,was built about 65 years ago.It is owned by the Dundas Chemical Company,Dumfries.The grandfather of Anne Gallagher,one of the children working on this project,used to work there just after World War II. Nowadays it is used to humanely kill farm animals which have been injured in some way ,or are old or diseased. Mr.Tommy Bird is the only person who works there now and he lives in nearby Wreay. {*************} The big house adjoining,Oakland House, used to belong to Miss Linton who owned Linton Tweed Mills,Shaddongate, Carlisle.She used to breed Irish Wolf_ hounds and show them at Cruft's.She is dead now and the house has been sold.
